name: Racer Prototype
description:
This is a prototype of an idea I had a while back. The original inspiration came from the "Speeder Bikes" in Star Wars—I wondered how you would actually control them while riding. After getting a quick proof of concept up and running, I pulled inspiration from the Jet Moto series. The result is something that feels quite unique!

Currently, you need an Xbox controller to play. The left joystick controls the left engine and the right joystick controls the right—tilt both up to go forward. Similarly, the left and right triggers control left and right turbo thrusters. Right now there are two test scenes with no real objective... just play around and have fun!
